  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="57835" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="57835" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.22</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="907">907</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="128"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Babylon</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. <b>Babylon</b> was launched in 2019. Top notes are Nutmeg, Saffron and Coriander; middle note is Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood and Cedar. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Top notes: Saffron essence, Nutmeg essence, Coriander essence<br />
Middle notes: Cypriol<br />
Base notes: Sandalwood, Sri Lanka essence, Cedarwood, Atlas essence, Vanilla absolute</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other                     </div>
                    May be too old-fashioned for some
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>
</pros-cons><div class="cell small-12"><p class="info-note" style="font-size: smaller"><b>Note:</b> The pros and cons listed on this page have been generated using the artificial intelligence system, which analyzes product reviews submitted by our members. While we strive to provide accurate and helpful information, we cannot guarantee the complete accuracy or reliability of the AI-generated pros and cons. Please read the full reviews and consider your own needs and preferences before making a purchasing decision.</p></div><fragram-photos-wrapper class="cell small-12"><div id="fragram-photos" class="strike-title">

<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/14629/news.14629-120x120.jpg" alt="Penhaligon&#039;s Racquets: Sports and Beyond Fragrance" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Penhaligon-s-Racquets-Sports-and-Beyond-Fragrance-14629.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Penhaligon&#039;s Racquets: Sports and Beyond Fragrance</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Vosnaki</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            02/05/21 07:22
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">4</span>
</div>

All you need to know is when you have this on, your wrist might as well be what meth is to a smackhead. I would chase this scent to the end of the earth. Boozy delicious yummy without being sickly unique and beautifully balanced. Babylon, I love you forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2363820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2363820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2324076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2324076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The main notes are vanilla and sandalwood.  I like to mix Babylon with a tiny drop of frankencense essential oil on my pulse points just to give a little more edge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2315489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2315489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2310495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310495" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alibaba40"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832969"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alibaba40" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Basso-75927.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75927.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Basso"title="Basso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832969">Alibaba40</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely gorgeous. I cant get enough of it. I get the base notes almost immediately after opening.  The rich vanilla is definitely the star of the show here. I get the saffron but its not like some other popular saffron scents.  Its softer and slightly fleeting. I wish it lasted a little longer but its a reasonable performer.  The richness of this fragrance, and the aesthetic of the bottle, make this a holiday/Christmas season contender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2310495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2310495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302725" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="halyfran"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2269051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="halyfran" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302725ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302725" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2269051">halyfran</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>GORG!! Never thought I would describe a woody scent as "decadent" but here we are. The combo of sandalwood, vanilla, saffron, and nutmug is so luscious, the sweet-earthy-spicy facet from the saffron almost causes a tickle in the back of my throat in the best way. Cedar is now a new favorite note of mine, particularly combined with the warmth of sandalwood. Reminds me of a winter's night spent sipping hot spiced cider and baking cinnamon cookies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2302725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2302725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300405" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miss Maven Moon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miss Maven Moon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Haute-Fragrance-Company-HFC/Wrap-Me-in-Dreams-62855.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62855.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wrap Me in Dreams"title="Wrap Me in Dreams"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307631">Miss Maven Moon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 14:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one, but one of my favorite perfumes of all time is Bouquet Ideale, so no surprise to me. This is less sweet and has the introduction of cedar (one of my fave woody notes). Although its gender neutral, im looking forward to spraying this on my boyfriend.<br />
<br />
<br />
Edit: I love this stuff! This is definitely my type of fragrance. Woody Vanilla without smelling like pencil shavings! I love bouquet ideale, but o do get pencil shavings from time to time. Dare I say that I love this more? Probably. Beautifully blended. If i had a signature scent, this would be it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2300405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2300405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288798" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="braidedhair76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090727"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="braidedhair76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090727">braidedhair76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 21:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>amazing smell that gets better the more and more you wear it. Gender doesn't matter here for this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2288798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2288798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264842" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SSBurn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298438"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298438.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SSBurn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298438">SSBurn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this! Its one of extremely few Cypriol scents I like. Its very unisex. Not overly strong or aromatic, the vanilla sits very soft and nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2264842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2264842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211716" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frank_yxz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frank_yxz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicolai-Parfumeur-Createur/Eau-de-Yuzu-61362.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61362.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Yuzu"title="Eau de Yuzu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211716ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211716" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249774">frank_yxz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A simple but sophisticated perfume, not necessarily unique but absolutely warm and beautiful. <br />
Vanilla is no doubt the main character here, but it does not make the perfume overly sweet and turn it into a gourmand perfume. You can already get the sweet and delicious vanilla in the opening, well mixed with nutmeg and saffron. It is sweet, spicy and slightly boozy. Normally I find nutmeg gives this kind of dry and dusty spiciness, but here in the opening I don't get the dryness; instead, it is mainly warm spicy. Saffron adds warmth too, but also brings this leathery scent. Both the leathery and spicy notes well balance the sweetness. At this stage I would simply describe it as a warm spicy leather vanilla perfume.<br />
<br />
Then it gets more and more woody and earthy on my skin, while the sweetness remains. I also find the leathery scent gets stronger and stronger. To me it is leaning more and more towards the masculine side. At certain point it gives me this vintage wooden furniture vibe.<br />
<br />
The drydown is simply beautiful and delicious. I would call it sweet leather with milky sandalwood in the background. It is warm but no heavy, which makes it a perfect choice for cold weather. <br />
<br />
The performance is also great. It lasts easily on my skin for the whole day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2211716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2211716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207943" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207943" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smitjat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smitjat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207943ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207943" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184980">smitjat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-04">07/04/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my go to scent. If you love musky warm vanilla scents, then this one is for you. This feels a bit more complex than say TF's Vanilla offerings as it has an added woody layer, albeit it very subtle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2207943"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2207943#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200357" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cabooter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2089916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cabooter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-1801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur"title="Musc Ravageur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2089916">Cabooter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-26">06/26/24 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nutmeg, creamy vanilla. Very soft and friendly. Comforting in a way.<br />
I like it, but wearing this made me get tired of it really quick. It is kind of boring.<br />
Too sweet and the nutmeg note is too much for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2200357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2200357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aeternitas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aeternitas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hanae-Mori/Magical-Moon-1578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magical Moon"title="Magical Moon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/603">Aeternitas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a decant of Babylon to compare to my newly discovered and beloved Bewitching Yasmine after reading a few reviews saying they are very close. I have worn it over the course of this past week, so I'll review Babylon on its own merit, and then I'll go into a comparison with Yasmine. <br />
<br />
<b>Babylon</b> is a simple and warm offering from Penhaligon's. It is mostly woody and vanillic on me...neither too woody nor too vanillic, instead brilliantly centered between the two, which is what makes it a perfect unisex fragrance. Though I said "simple" (considering the minimal note profile), it's beautifully crafted and smooth. Part of its simplicity is that I find it quite linear, but once again, it's done very well; there's nothing wrong with linear if you're getting what you want out of your perfume. Longevity, however... not worth the price. It disappears after an hour, which is pretty disappointing for this level of perfumery. I will save the rest of my decant to test in winter and hopefully remember to update.  <br />
For now, I find Babylon a bit lackluster in comparison to....<br />
<br />
...<b>The Bewitching Yasmine</b>. If you're not <i>really</i> looking for differences, I can see where one could think they are close, especially going by the initial spray of each. Sure, they are cousins with vanilla and spices. But... Babylon does not have the sweet and alluring jasmine note that Yasmine has, which is quite obvious. Yasmine is a heavy-hitter with coffee, incense, and oud... all of which are also not present in Babylon. I find them both warm and luxe, but still different in character... Babylon is one to shake your hand and walk you to your door, whereas Bewitching Yasmine will drape herself over you and ask you to come upstairs. <br />
<br />
My personal bias is to a boldly seductive perfume like Yasmine, so take this review how you will. They're both great perfumes, it just depends on what you're looking for. <br />
Just wanted to pound out my little comparison (and opinion) for anyone else exploring Penhaligon's perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2198216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2198216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198004" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Millybow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Millybow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164327">Millybow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample today, Ive been wearing this for a good eight hours, it smells an awful lot like Addictive Saffron from Zara, although, whereas this goes rather sickly playdoh, the Zara fragrance stays smooth and spicy with only a hint of playdoh and never turns sickly. 35.99 for Zara Addictive Saffron as opposed to over 200 for this. I know which one Ill be buying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2198004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2198004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2186715" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Grefvinnan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Grefvinnan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-1801.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1801.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur"title="Musc Ravageur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2186715ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2186715" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305051">Grefvinnan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 02:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with cherry leather, after that its very similar to Hugo Boss Deep Red.<br />
I like Babylon/Deep Red on paper, the smell is nice enough. But when Im wearing them I find myself bothered and distracted by the scent, like an itch or a noise wanting my attention and demanding to be fixed before I can go on with my day. Its like this type of scent wants to be a bit too much in a bit too many directions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2186715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2186715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178568" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iadoreyourdior"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="iadoreyourdior" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178568ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178568" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346208">iadoreyourdior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a great unisex woody vanilla for sure. Incency and spicy. Not too sweet. <br />
<br />
On strip, sandalwood is a little sharp for my taste. <br />
<br />
Might check this one out one more time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2178568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2178568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
