Such a unique smell, woody but just right amount, creamy, a touch of spice, oooo just perfect,but this fragrance isn't sweet, so a deeper more masculin fragrance I would say! I usually love sweet fragrance but I ador this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2117882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2117882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097789" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097789" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ty/dc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ty/dc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097789ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097789" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793">Ty/dc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Babylon is the best Penhaligons fragrance in my opinion, such a warm &amp; luxurious scent. The notes speak for themselves but the vanilla is a stand out for me. It definitely hits the brief, I can imagine this coming from the ancient city of Babylon. <br />
<br />
I disagree with the comparisons to Raghba. I absolutely hate that fragrance, it gave me a headache every time I smelt it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2097789"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2097789#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="E.H.Tersono"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252545"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1252545.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="E.H.Tersono" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252545">E.H.Tersono</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely gourmand that reminds me a bit of the now discontinued Traversee du Bosphore from L'Artisan Parfumeur. Not at all like most ambre fragrances, much more like gourmand vanillas. Nothing sour, nothing animalic, just gentle vanilla and spices with a light woody background.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2084321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2084321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ellerhur?"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ellerhur?" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016853">ellerhur?</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells exactly like the Teisseire Grenadine syrup. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2062260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2062260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059223" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have heard Demi Rawling recently talking highly of how great Babylon smells. Her description seems exactly what I am into momentarily, so I had to go and try Babylon. As usual, shes right, this is a sophisticated vanilla gourmand scent. <br />
<br />
Babylon is such an intoxicating warm, spicy, aromatic intense vanilla. I realised last fall that I really adore the following combination of notes in fragrances: lots of sweet, creamy vanilla, sprinkled with nutmeg, cardamom or cinnamon and spiced up with coriander or pink pepper! This combo has conquered my heart and all I  want to smell is this!<br />
<br />
This is that combo with added Cyprol oil, saffron and two types of smooth woods: cedar and sandalwood. Its perfection in the bottle and its performing beautifully. Which is fantastic since its going past 200 euros per bottle.<br />
<br />
I am not completely sold on Babylon yet because last fall I fell in love and bought a big bottle of Carlisle. At first sniff they dont seem to be very alike, until you get to the dry down. But trust me, I have tested Babylon today both on skin and on blotter and I have sprayed from my Carlisle bottle on the other hand. In the  deep dry down, after about the five hour mark, these two beauties are 80%similar, with Babylon smelling more feminine since it doesnt have patchouli or davana. Carlisle smells a bit more aromatic, fresh spicy, a bit fruity. Babylon more like a smooth creamy, spicy vanilla! Both smell delicious, luxurious and expensive.<br />
<br />
I prefer Babylons bottle better, since its more feminine and pretty looking. I think Carlisle is technically a masculine scent, but its freaking fantastic smelling!!<br />
<br />
I see this compared heavily with Bouquet Ideale from Xerjoff, another scent I own, but not worn in a while. I have to grab my Xerjoff bottle  to sniff these two side by side. If these two prove to be very similar like with Carlisle, I might not need  to buy a third bottle of the same exact same juice. I should be rational enough not to do so</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2059223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2059223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051848" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051848" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karinavi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karinavi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051848ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051848" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071">karinavi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like a chinese buddhist temple. very woody, spicy, and little incense-y even though that isn't a listed note. the vanilla isn't a main player to my nose. it really is beautiful and nostalgic but just has such strong projection and sillage; it's too much, makes me cough and sneeze. <br />
<br />
also definitely smells extremely close to bouquet ideale, this one's just stronger and less sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2051848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2051848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2044355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044355" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="celestial"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1196374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="celestial" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Flower-by-Kenzo-Poppy-Bouquet-Eau-de-Parfum-58624.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58624.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flower by Kenzo Poppy Bouquet Eau de Parfum"title="Flower by Kenzo Poppy Bouquet Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196374">celestial</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon's Babylon is a very high-quality, woody, spicy vanilla perfume, which smells very interesting and brings up olfactory memories of past places and scents. It quickly becomes a skin-scent, and after reading the previous review, I can actually smell a rubbery/tyre note but I don't find it unpleasant in combination with the rest of the notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2044355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2044355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039483" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039483" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karendallas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1055396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="karendallas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Cheap-Chic-727.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.727.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheap & Chic"title="Cheap & Chic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039483ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039483" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1055396">karendallas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-23">01/23/24 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought The Trade Routes Discovery Set as I wanted a new fragrance and looking through the notes on them all, I was sure I'd find one to fit me. Unfortunately not. With Babylon, Legacy of Petra and Halfeti, there's a note of rubber, which I just can't move past. I've tried them in the summer and winter and there's no real difference on my skin - just smells like tyres on a warm/cold day. The problem here could well be that unisex scents lean towards masculine on me and that's not really what I'm after so... For a point of reference, I wear Empressa, Bewitching Yasmine and Lady Penhaligon from their range but I've yet to find a unisex scent, that really fits me.  Go for the discovery ranges before you make a choice, better to be safe than spend 200 on something you don't like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2039483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2039483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032728" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YourFragranceFriend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YourFragranceFriend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170">YourFragranceFriend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance smells like luxury travels. It's one that every time I apply, I'm surprised again how great it is. I feel rich. I feel well-traveled.<br />
<br />
I most notice the cypriol, which is complex and resembles many other ingredients that are woody, dry, aromatic, and deep earthy. You get this depth without it being an overwhelming or challenging scent. I think this is a complex niche fragrance that the masses could easily enjoy. It's balanced by spices and vanilla. It's a beautiful combination that rounds this out without letting it go gourmand. Both sandalwood and cedar are clear and can be distinctly picked out. One thing I don't notice is saffron. If the almost latex/sterile scent of saffron can take on bothers you, you will not detect that here.<br />
<br />
This is best for cold weather. I'd say winter only if you live in a warmer place and into fall if you're in a colder climate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2032728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2032728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Autumnal Elf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Autumnal Elf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Volutes-Eau-de-Parfum-49101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Volutes Eau de Parfum"title="Volutes Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387596">Autumnal Elf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ugh this fragrance is so beautiful it almost hurts my heart. The cozy, comforting scent of Babylon has uplifted my spirits on this bitterly cold blizzard day in Iowa; radiating up from the collar of my t-shirt &amp; hoodie, giving me the warmest feelings with its rich, cozy, lightly spiced aromatic scent. Babylon is a bottled up hug! The vanilla does not dominate -- it is so well blended and balanced. Not as much of a spice-bomb as the notes might imply. I find The Bewitching Yasmine to be more spice forward than Babylon. This is THE perfect unisex winter scent. Save it for the coldest, bleakest days, apply liberally (4-6 sprays) all over the bare decolletage/chest, and thank me later. <br />
<br />
I'm so relieved that Babylon is not overhyped on social media nor is it available in Sephora; because gen z-ers don't deserve to be graced with this luxurious beauty. Let them eat Baccarat rouge clones . <br />
<br />
While Babylon is definitely complex enough on its own, it would layer beautifully with other nutmeg containing fragrances (such as Delina, or Oud For Greatness. I wish I had some Delina on hand so I could try it. Delina and OFG are indeed lovely together, try it). All that said, I love this smell. The longevity is phenomenal too, will get you through an entire workday without reapplication. Penhaligons is a house of quality, period. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2028979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2028979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024953" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 20:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh man, I LOVE Babylon. I don't know why she isn't talked about more because this stuff is drop dead gorgeous. Very similar to THOO Golden Powder, but Babylon is 100x better in terms of quality &amp; smoothness. I'm starting to realize that I love cypriol oil, because that note in the heart makes my eyes roll to the back of my head. Phewwww!. I also get a fruity note, which was surprising since a fruity note isn't listed on Fragrantica or Penhaligon's website. My nose wants to say it's plum..? Regardless, this stuff is an absolute dream for me. 10/10, masterpiece &amp; perfectly unisex!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2024953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2024953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023121" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aertz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758718"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1758718.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aertz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023121ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023121" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758718">aertz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 23:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>yummy woody vanilla, goes sweet on me in a really interesting, complex way</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="2023121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=2023121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990393" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="santiniansia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1031457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="santiniansia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Athena-Fragrances/Gourmandize-73215.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73215.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gourmandize"title="Gourmandize"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1031457">santiniansia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have way too many vanillas. When I was given a sample of this, I never thought it would end up in my top 3. I don't really like coriander, and I'm glad I don't notice it here. It's a slightly spicy vanilla that's very well blended. It has moderate projection but very good longevity. It's best suited to the colder months, but I wear it all year round. I especially love wearing it to bed because I find it very comforting. I can smell the similarities with Bouquet Ideale, but that one opens with a blast of something weird that I don't really like. The magic of Bouquet Ideale is in the dry down which smells like Babylon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1990393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1990393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1959174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1959174" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="colorfulmess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047543"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1047543.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="colorfulmess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Christos-81631.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81631.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Christos"title="Christos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1959174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1959174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047543">colorfulmess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-23">10/23/23 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely! Fulfills all of my powdery fantasies. The spices and vanilla give it almost a chai tea base, with a smoky dry down. Layer this with a tobacco note, and it will be even better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1959174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1959174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1937306" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ahmosenefertari"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/636930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ahmosenefertari" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1937306ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1937306" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/636930">ahmosenefertari</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-25">09/25/23 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spices spices...something here reminds of clove oil on the first 1h. Really intense. You feel the sweetness of the vanilla in the background, but in my skin the intensity of clove oil is just too much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1937306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1937306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1933590" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chicago Tony T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.773746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chicago Tony T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Daarej-pour-Homme-19688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Daarej pour Homme"title="Daarej pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1933590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1933590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/773746">Chicago Tony T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Warm spices with some woodiness. Very smooth and delicate. Can easily be worn in all 4 seasons as it is a bit on the lighter side. Very office safe and great for people that don't like amber and/or tobacco. It is not a vanilla based scent totally as the nutmeg and woods play dominant roles. The thing is with so many middle eastern houses offering similar scents at a much more affordable price that this is an easy pass for me. I only see die hard fans of the house picking this one up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1933590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1933590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1932595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1932595" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alexx123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796737"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alexx123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1932595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1932595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796737">Alexx123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-20">09/20/23 06:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really beautiful sweet scented, smooth, warm and woody fragrance. You can really smell the wood in this fragrance and its stunning. I think it leans towards more masculine however can definitely be worn by a female due to its sweetness and warmth. I own black phantom by Kilian and if you like that type of perfume youd definitely like this one too. This scent would be perfect for autumn/winter. <br />
<br />
In terms of performance, Id say its quite strong. Once smelled on someone the scent definitely sticks with you and can also be smelled from afar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1932595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1932595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928527" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feuermaiden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feuermaiden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boy-Smells/Woodphoria-75837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woodphoria"title="Woodphoria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928527ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928527" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-15">09/15/23 07:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A bit too powdery of a vanilla for my taste, but still very pleasant with a touch of spicy undertones. I wouldn't call this a gourmand vanilla, but rather a smooth one with a hint of woodiness and warmth. It didn't wow me, so I don't feel the need to spend the money. The longevity on me was terrible, similarly to most other Penhaligon's offerings I've tried. Maybe it's me, but these just do not stay on my skin.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1928527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1928527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabertooth_salem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310673"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1310673.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabertooth_salem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310673">sabertooth_salem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>And what rough beast, its hour come round at last,   <br />
Slouches towards Bethlehem to be born?<br />
WB Yeats, The Second Coming<br />
<br />
If youve ever seen the Burney Relief, the carved tablet depicting a nude goddess, standing atop lions and flanked by owls, this fragrance reminds me of it. <br />
<br />
Colorless terracotta, but rich nonetheless. There is something nurturing about it, like milk and honey infused with vanilla bark. Lactonic and sweet sustenance amidst the vast, dry desert.<br />
<br />
Yet there is also something deeper here, something the untrained eye (or nose) might miss, like the amulets the goddess clutches or her taloned feet. You lean closer to find fragrant spices, sandalwood, and sweet saffron as well. <br />
<br />
I wish Penhaligons had captured more of the majestic wonder of the ancient world rather than the beige ruins of the city. <br />
<br />
Nonetheless, this oriental, woody vanilla is quite opulent. Just like Babylon, the depth of the fragrance makes itself known at the start, and wafts back over time like a ghost in the historians mind.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1910264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1910264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908495" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AhmedElbahja95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1793463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AhmedElbahja95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793463">AhmedElbahja95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Babylon by Penhaligon's is a sweet unisex powerhouse with moderate/strong performance. Babylon stays on my skin for about 4-6 hours but stays on my wife's for over 8 hours. I used to really love this fragrance, but now I'm not so fond of it. Maybe it's because I have used it a lot. However, I still enjoy smelling this on my wife. I would recommend trying this fragrance. I rate this 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1908495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1908495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899256" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillaesquegirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1812348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillaesquegirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812348">vanillaesquegirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-10">08/10/23 23:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is easily one of my top 2 vanilla perfumes of all time. babylon smells as if christmas up in a massachusetts lake house was in a bottle. upon first spray the notes of a spicy woody vanilla are very evident due to how strong it is, and once it dies down you can also sense the hints of nutmeg mixed in with the woody and vanilla notes alongside still having that spicy smell that makes the perfume an absolute winner. it smells so good that i literally wear it in the summer despite the fact that babylon is more so suitable as a fall/winter perfume. this perfume also will have you smelling like that one rich aunt that comes around once a year yet is still so mysterious to you and your cousins. while it is quite pricey, i think babylon is def worth the price and everyone should absolutely own this perfume at least once in their life.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1899256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1899256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1897278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1897278" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Helloneighbor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1402522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Helloneighbor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fendi/La-Baguette-93162.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93162.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Baguette"title="La Baguette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1897278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1897278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); The dry down reminds me a lot of kayali burning cherry for some reason. The opening was nice and spicy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1897278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1897278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1884582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1884582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lord Lucan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1532517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lord Lucan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Marylebone-Wood-49654.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49654.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marylebone Wood"title="Marylebone Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1884582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1884582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1532517">Lord Lucan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-22">07/22/23 12:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of Penhaligon Trade Route perfumes and of an extremely high quality. <br />
The sandalwood and nagarmotha standout to the extent the other scents are drowned out.  I am definitely transported back to India, Sri Lanka, the smell of oud, the smell of incense in the air,  definitely exotic. A brother scent of Halfeti, so that's about right. <br />
Not for me but recommended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1884582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1884582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880992" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whateverwhocares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whateverwhocares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007">Whateverwhocares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-17">07/17/23 17:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice, woody vanilla note. Too powdery for me but objectively well blended. Nuanced, decent harmonics. Not bad at all. In fact its very good. Properly spiced. Nice, subtle and handsome. Unisex if you want it to be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1880992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1880992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877389" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frankly B"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773429"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frankly B" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877389ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877389" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773429">Frankly B</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 19:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Boozy, nutmeggy, spicy, woody vanilla goodness with a touch of gentle saffron thrown in for delicate measure. Utterly lovely. The DEFINITIVE boozy vanilla fragrance for me. All others pale in comparison. Totally addictive. I cant stop smelling my wrist!  I just wish it had the usual Penhaligon projection and longevity. Its comparatively wan but I dont care. Ill just put it on more often!  I cant help myself. Its THAT good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1877389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1877389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876838" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stephendd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1657044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stephendd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657044">stephendd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 04:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Babylon is a fragrance which perfectly blends vanilla notes with wood notes and is arguably one of my favourite winter/autumn scents. Akin to Naxos by Xerjoff, the vanilla note is smooth and inoffensive, but as a creation in it's entirety it's not overly sweet or gourmand. The wood notes are not as pronounced as some many think it to be. It perfectly compliments the vanilla notes giving some complexity to the fragrance. Upon spraying, the saffron and nutmeg evoke this sense of warmth and coupled with the vanilla makes for a great creation. <br />
<br />
9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1876838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1876838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1860743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
