Its a beautiful, clean vanilla which settles dreamily onto the skin but simply does not last long enough!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1853167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1853167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1848440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1848440" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tessture"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tessture" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/I-Profumi-di-Firenze/Acqua-Mirabile-Odorosa-di-Firenze-9765.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9765.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "title="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1848440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1848440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719">tessture</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-03">06/03/23 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I also loved this and then hated it. It went on with a lovely powdered wood incense (before it's burnt), like those bricks they press out of aromatic woods, but as it dried down it got pervasive and overpowering and I had to scrub it. AND of course being the quality of Penhaligon, I couldn't get it off. The longevity was amazing. Too bad I hated it in the end.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1848440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1848440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844084" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AstridCN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1759911"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AstridCN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844084ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844084" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1759911">AstridCN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-29">05/29/23 02:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved it and then I hated it. It started very rich with the spices from the topnotes strongly coming through. I personally really do not enjoy a vanilla forward fragrance, but at first this seemed like the perfect vanilla fragrance for me. You get the base of vanilla but it is layered under the spices of the topnotes which makes it come forward a lot more subtle. This was the love part. However after wearing it for 2 to 3 hours, all I got was full vanilla. All other elements of this perfume had left the stage and all I could still sense was just plain, strong vanilla. And like I said earlier, that just really isn't a note for me. What started as the idea of the perfect subtle vanilla fragrance mixed with perfectly balanced saffron ( contrary to vanilla one of my favorite notes), became an absolute let down. <br />
<br />
Even if you are a big fan of vanilla fragrances, I still find this fragrance disappointing since after just a short amount of time it loses around 85% of it depth and you are left with just one note out of the 7 original ones.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1844084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1844084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1835039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1835039" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hojubaby"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hojubaby" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Tilia-91688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tilia"title="Tilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1835039ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1835039" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633">Hojubaby</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-17">05/17/23 02:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely spicy and woody vanilla scent, its blended very well and the sweetness doesn't get cloying.<br />
Its a delightful spicey, warm fragrance. I dont think its worth a full bottle, there are many fragrances similair to this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1835039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1835039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1819998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffathon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffathon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1819998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1819998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357164">Sniffathon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 09:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If, like me, you were sampling this expecting a vanilla fragrance you will be very confused. Im my opinion, unlike many of the other reviews, this is a woody fragrance with vanilla as the backup singer - the Fragrantica pyramid is an excellent indicator of what to expect. For me, once I removed my preconceptions I was able to sample and enjoy this without being disappointed that my vanilla expectations were not being met. <br />
Anyway, this is a pleasant enough woody vanilla fragrance with slight spice. On my skin there is a distinct petrol or rubber-like quality to it that actually makes it quite interesting and not unpleasant at all. Longevity is excellent. Overall though I dont feel its worth the money and is not very wow-ing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1819998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1819998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804971" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-09">04/09/23 21:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lightly spiced woody vanilla The sultry fragrance starts off with sweet milky chai and then it's hugged by this warm sandalwood.  Absolutely sexy empowered feminine fragrance for a night out on the prowl. I can imagine just Penelope Cruz in Jamon, Jamon just walking down the road in that red dress. The one thing is that this fragrance has a light sillage, which I would've liked a bit more, for I want to get some heads turning. But for my fellow goddesses,if you wear while making out, you might end up having the best night of your life<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Aries Sagittarius Scorpio</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1804971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1804971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1773885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sweet without being over powering .. it leaves a scene trail that I find Intoxicating . Its very morish &amp; good projection...<br />
<br />
Personally I think It a very sext scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1773885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1773885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1765799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1765799" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sanrio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349730.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sanrio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Midnight-Fantasy-802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Fantasy"title="Midnight Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1765799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1765799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349730">Sanrio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-21">02/21/23 15:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smoky, smoldering, only slightly sweetened by the vanilla. A masculine smoky-woody fragrance with a slightly bohemian vibe. I get a lot of cedar wood, specifically. <br />
<br />
I can imagine this being on a man whose girlfriend wore By the Fireplace. They make a good team; both kinda smell like a campfire but in different ways (this is cleaner and less sweet, by the fireplace is more toasty and gourmand.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1765799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1765799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748143" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mlleghoul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/462232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.462232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mlleghoul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BeauFort-London/Terror-Magnificence-57012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terror & Magnificence"title="Terror & Magnificence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/462232">mlleghoul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-31">01/31/23 07:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is Penhaligons Babylon meant to evoke Babylon, the den of iniquity and pinnacle of sin? Or perhaps that groovy Satanic prostitute, arrayed in purple and scarlet, decked with pearls and precious stones, with her golden cup spilling with abominations and filthiness? Im not sure this softly-spiced, velvet-wooded fragrance is as outrageous or dramatic as all of that. Imagine that golden cup, surely sensationalized to pique public indignation, was instead some sort of humble, unassuming vessel, a bowl of roughly carved but fragrant sandalwood, filled with a milky liquid, redolent of honeyed saffron, the aromatic, earthy warmth of nutmeg and corianders peppery-aniseed camphor, and delicately resinous, subtly smoky vanilla. If youre a fan of Diors Hypnotic Poison, but dont love that obnoxious root beer note, I think youd find Babylon a more tasteful and understated option. I do enjoy this scent immensely, but Id still like to smell a more vivid and exuberant perfumed interpretation of this apocalyptic beauty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1748143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1748143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1745650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1745650" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="malenapo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/49037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.49037.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="malenapo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Stellar-Times-68356.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68356.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stellar Times"title="Stellar Times"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1745650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1745650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/49037">malenapo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-28">01/28/23 00:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Babylon, Cuir Noir and Oud Nude are almost identical.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1745650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1745650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1741364" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1741364" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaContessina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaContessina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barnia"title="Barnia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1741364ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1741364" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645">LaContessina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-23">01/23/23 10:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A huge cedar, spicy vanilla with an oriental background, smoky, incensey, balsamic, but no oud, for a change!<br />
Beautifuly constructed, it's grand and cozy at the same time.<br />
Has the allure of Fumerie Turque and Halfeti Cedar (without being such an atom bomb).<br />
A night time fragrance, perhaps more suited for a distinct gentleman, and i say gentle.<br />
This perfume inspires gentleness.<br />
I like it a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1741364"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1741364#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721882" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GrenadeGirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633901"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1633901.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GrenadeGirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floraiku/Spring-River-96555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spring River"title="Spring River"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633901">GrenadeGirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know why, but I just can't seem to get on with Penhaligon's fragrances - This genuinely disappoints me, because normally on paper I like them.<br />
<br />
For this one, the paper test showed it as the best of the bunch I have tried so far (Halfeti, Constance, Yasmine and this), I definitely get the woody vanilla, especially on the dry down. It is really light, clean and subtle, but also manages to be balanced and distinctive. On me, however, this fragrance smells .. well, kinda the same, but with some weird toothpaste overtone going on. Forgive me, but I have some scents that suit me beautifully, and I just don't need 'l'air du toothpaste' in my life.<br />
<br />
In summary, i'd say if the notes combination is good for you then there is a strong chance youll love this. I would urge against a blind buy though, ideally go the sample route first - if it goes wrong with my chemistry then it could happen to others, and it may not be Penhaligon's top end, but they are still not cheap!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1721882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1721882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1717689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1717689" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="snifftacular"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595238.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="snifftacular" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Ormonde-Man-4931.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4931.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ormonde Man"title="Ormonde Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1717689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1717689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595238">snifftacular</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-26">12/26/22 10:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a beautiful fragrance. This is a woody, clean and slightly spicy, slightly herbaceous vanilla fragrance. It's not syrupy sweet, but rather on the dry side, which I like. Although I believe it leans a bit feminine, a man could pull this off I think. I would say of all the vanilla fragrances I've smelled this year, this one has to be the best so far. It is rich, opulent, while at the same time being very relaxed, cozy and comforting. You could wear this for yourself at home just for some self-care, or you could dress this up and go out to an event. It's very versatile, but more suited to colder weather. Like all Penhaligon's fragrances, the presentation is beautiful and there's a nice story behind the fragrance. I really enjoy this house and look forward to acquiring more fbs from them.<br />
<br />
This frag is AMAZING when layered with Diptyque's Tam Dao. Since both have sandalwood in the base, they blend very beautifully. The Tam Dao gives it that really solid creamy sandalwood base that is dry and a bit vegetal, while the Babylon on top lends its beautiful vanilla note with the spicy and woody undertones. Really a premium combo if you have both frags. They combine to form an accord that is unisex, very sexy and appealing, radiant, while comforting and refined at the same time. Highly recommend you try this combo. <br />
<br />
10/10 Snifftacular!<br />
<br />
I'm now looking for a full bottle the next time I'm at the discounters.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1717689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1717689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1713013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713013" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Autumnal Elf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Autumnal Elf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Volutes-Eau-de-Parfum-49101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Volutes Eau de Parfum"title="Volutes Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387596">Autumnal Elf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-19">12/19/22 17:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love that it's unlike any other vanilla fragrance I own. It's a warm, woody, smoky sweet, ambery resinous vanilla. Perfect for cooler and cold weather -- for when the leaves just start to turn, and on through to the new year. Not too complicated, a comforting and inoffensive scent. The bottle is so adorable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1713013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1713013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1712626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1712626" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.267736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olympic-Orchids-Artisan-Perfumes/Chevalier-Vert-45515.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45515.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chevalier Vert"title="Chevalier Vert"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1712626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1712626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736">meama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-19">12/19/22 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice aromatic-vanilla<br />
I love the opening with the smoky bacon aroma of the Cypriol oil but it quicly evolves toward a classic dj-vu spicy mix of coriander and nutmeg on a base of sweet woody-vanilla.<br />
Very simple but well done and easy to like - except the synthetic sandalwood but it's discreet.<br />
Weak sillage and longevity<br />
I blind bought a big bottle for 80 on the net and it's not worth more</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1712626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1712626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1710580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1710580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1710580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1701768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1701768" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="makazich"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1518040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="makazich" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Happy-Chopard-Lemon-Dulci-49806.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49806.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Happy Chopard Lemon Dulci"title="Happy Chopard Lemon Dulci"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1701768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1701768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1518040">makazich</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-04">12/04/22 03:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved it from the first try, amazing scent for autumn and winter. It is definitely complex but if I can compare it to similar (and more affordable) perfume it would definitely be By the fireplace, and, for closer effect layered with Autumn Vibes also from MM brand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1701768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1701768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1700196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1700196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RawSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RawSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-EAUX-Primordiales/Champaca-Supercritique-49555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Champaca Supercritique"title="Champaca Supercritique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1700196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1700196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192">RawSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-01">12/01/22 17:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my 15th bottle from Penhaligon, I mostly own British Tales frags because they so easy to wear, and the variety for summer frags in that collection is immense.  This however has got to be my No1 Penhaligon's fragrance, I think it holds up against my favourite which is Sartorial, and blows Cairo (again was a favourite) out of the water, takes over.  It reminds me of another frag, and I can't put my finger on it, I think it might have some resemblance to a Xerjoff frag, but I've kinda gone off Xerjoff after amassing a good 15 bottles as well.  I'm not really good at painting the lovely pictures so many of you wonderfully do, and even if I could, I'm sure there are far better descriptions that would better mine, I can simply that this is *gorgeous* I blind bought, and no regrets, but I blind buy most of my frags, part of the excitement .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1700196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1700196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1694580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1694580" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CottoCelina2022"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1600927"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CottoCelina2022" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1694580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1694580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1600927">CottoCelina2022</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-23">11/23/22 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hated the opening of this one, it smelled like a scented polish remover, grass and rubber. But as it dried down i could smell some of the notes people down below described. It slowly turned in to a sweet spicebomb.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1694580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1694580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Stunning, rich, spicy and deep. Elegant and formal. If it was a colour, it would be gold.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1682622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1682622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A little sweeter, not the same longevity, and not as dense/confrontative/polarizing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1677355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1677355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1673207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75302">aray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-24">10/24/22 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Someone below mentioned the inside of a treasure chest. Ill go one step further - its the scent that hits you when you (while sipping on some Bourbon) discover a box of Titiana Cigars inside a very old cedar chest. Boozy, smoky, sweet. Quite decadent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1673207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1673207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1672225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1672225" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kotikina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kotikina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Attar-Collection/Khaltat-Night-38133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khaltat Night"title="Khaltat Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1672225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1672225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532">Kotikina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-23">10/23/22 02:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can say that this is one of the scents I could not forget since I tried it. Never have I ever met such rich and spicy woody vanilla scent that is so refined at the same time. Very  well executed. Nothing is sharp or screechy. Nothing smells synthetic. Looking at the notes, so many things could go wrong - nutmeg or coriander could overpower everything, saffron can smell like iodine and outshine everything else again, sandalwood can be screechy, the whole composition might get cloying,  but no. Here we have a perfect and smooth concoction. <br />
 It is an olfactory journey, which takes you to far away lands and long ago times, not a male/female scent. Amazing in the autumn and winter.<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 6/10<br />
Sillage: 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1672225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1672225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1672208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1670763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1670763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1661533" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1661533" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marie76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.138192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marie76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Tender-Light-69708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tender Light"title="Tender Light"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1661533ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1661533" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138192">Marie76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 05:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very intense and woody, resinous, smoky. It smells like the inside of a treasure chest.<br />
<br />
Unisex, not feminine, and really not a "human" scent. I use it for ambiance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1661533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1661533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660992" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="torturedsoulboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464557"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1464557.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="torturedsoulboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464557">torturedsoulboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-07">10/07/22 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went in thinking I would hate this house and it was love love love at first spray. This and Gentle Fluidity Gold by MFK are the best vanilla fragrances I've ever smelled. The saffron gives it a gentle leathery feel, the wood gives it a bit of a tanginess, and the is done just right. This may be popular in the Middle East, but to me this is very Western especially if you consider fragrances like let's say Oajan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1660992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1660992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658269" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hugo Montez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/985319"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.985319.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hugo Montez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/985319">Hugo Montez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-03">10/03/22 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Saffron-vanilla combo. Very popular in middle eastern releases. Guerlain Les absolutes d'orient vibe or Lancme Oud Bouquet. This one instead of a woody oud note, it plays the gourmand version of that style. With more vanilla and a cypriol green-smoky undertone. Nice one but not remarkable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1658269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1658269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1650111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1650111" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bloodlust"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/785193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.785193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bloodlust" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Blanche-Bete-70189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche Bte"title="Blanche Bte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1650111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1650111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/785193">Bloodlust</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found it interesting nobody has drawn comparisons to Dames Black flower Mexican vanilla! (Was once such a trending topic back in the day) - the vanilla/nutmeg combo mimics that same dry, ever so slightly spicy vanilla. <br />
<br />
Babylon is stunning for vanilla lovers who dont love toothache sweet scents, it is unisex. Not your cake batter vanilla, something a hint exotic, a bit dry and almost a little ~too much~ at times- a bit too nutty, a bit too dry, something. It catches in your throat. something somewhere in here prevents this from being the perfect winter full bottle staple. As another review stated, it gets tiring to wear throughout the day - and it does last ALL day. <br />
<br />
The opening is much more on the spicy woody side, and tapers off into a more sweet base, wood is present throughout, but its a background player. I almost wish there was a little bit of a twist in the note pyramid to keep it from falling flat- but ultimately I find penhaligons DNA to just be a little bit boring. <br />
<br />
If you are looking for something safe and comfortable, a winter vanilla- a spicy chai latte type of scent, give this a try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1650111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1650111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1635653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I would say that it leans slightly masculine, but it really is nice. Smoky, slightly sweet, piny. Perfectly balanced. This is what I wish By The Fireplace would smell like. Probably won't be purchasing a full bottle though as it gets a little tiring after a few hours of wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1635653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1635653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1628376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1628376" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abbieclark67"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="abbieclark67" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1628376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1628376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472302">abbieclark67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-21">08/21/22 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful scent! It boasts a delectable, delicate blend of smokey cypriol, cedarwood, and boozy, rich vanilla to sweeten and balance. Babylon evokes nostalgic feelings in me. Warm and spicy, with notes of vanilla and cedar. Longevity and projection are both above-average. This spiced Vanilla is really comfortable and soothing. There's no cloying sweetness here. Beautiful silage that lasts the entire day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1628376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1628376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1622875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The end. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1622875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1622875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
