<br />
Spicy vanilla with some wood on the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1616557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1616557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1591138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1591138" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="likesleet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1510132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1510132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="likesleet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/HUNQ/004-Lifeguard-69630.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69630.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="#004 Lifeguard"title="#004 Lifeguard"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1591138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1591138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1510132">likesleet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-25">06/25/22 08:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>didn't get any vanilla. lots of woody coolness. reminds me of a eucalyptus or mint essential oil, not in its smell but in its effect on the nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1591138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1591138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1586439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1586439" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="twoski"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1358671"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1358671.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="twoski" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktoria-Minya/Hedonist-Absolute-57928.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57928.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hedonist Absolute"title="Hedonist Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1586439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1586439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1358671">twoski</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-17">06/17/22 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very interesting vanilla-centric fragrance. There's an overdose of vanilla sitting atop an interesting spice blend of nutmeg, saffron, and coriander. There's a nice woody backdrop with a papyrus note from the cypriol oil. Something about this makes me think of christmas, not sure why. It reminds me of some sort of fresh baked cookies, despite the woody notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1586439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1586439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1583025" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ateghipc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607852.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ateghipc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1583025ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1583025" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607852">ateghipc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-12">06/12/22 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla is fully on display here with everything else playing a supporting role. its opulent and rich, yet somehow light. The nutmeg does a lot to help ground it, and there is a restrained touch of cedar that contributes to a smooth transition between the more prominent vanilla and nutmeg notes. Its impeccably blended and leans slightly feminine to me. Thoroughly a festive and warm scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1583025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1583025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1580730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1580730" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elledeelee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elledeelee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lacoste-Fragrances/Lacoste-Pour-Femme-Elixir-53415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lacoste Pour Femme Elixir"title="Lacoste Pour Femme Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1580730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1580730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178574">elledeelee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-09">06/09/22 02:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very very beautiful, creamy woods and sweet spiced caramel. Immediately reminds me of Sandalwood Temple by Sana Jardin, but denser and richer. Totally agree that it's extremely similar to Raghba too. It's like the two of them had a baby, which is fitting given that this fragrance has all the strength of a newborn trying to hold their own head up. This is elevated though, a high quality and well blended scent, where Ragbha is a little rough around the edges by comparison. But then again, who doesn't like a little bit of rough ;-)  <br />
<br />
Babylon is a beautiful fragrance for grown people of any gender to enjoy, but only lasts briefly on me before it becomes a skin scent, so for the money, it simply isn't worth it. I will stick to Raghba which can take me the whole way through a night out at a bargain price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1580730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1580730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578626" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nikath"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nikath" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Love-Delight-89959.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89959.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Delight"title="Love Delight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235347">nikath</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-06">06/06/22 02:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, spicy and woody as expected. Mature scent. To me, this smells more masculine but can definitely be worn by anyone. I am picking up something faint that smells like leather or oud in the opening, and something in here smells sour to me which I do not enjoy in a fragrance. Babylon definitely reminds me of Bouquet Ideale as mentioned before but this is less sweet and more smokey.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1578626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1578626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1574246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1574246" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lady Nightshadow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1218445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lady Nightshadow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1574246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1574246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218445">Lady Nightshadow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-30">05/30/22 16:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin, Babylon is a beautiful cloud of sweet spices with pieces of aromatic woods dripping honey and amber. There's not much dryness, no bitterness at all.<br />
<br />
The spices give a big contribute to the oriental vibe of this scent, and thanks to vanilla they end up not being pungent, but contributing with a soft, diffused, sweet aroma to the woody notes. <br />
It seems to be quite linear in time, but beautifully complex, blended and well rounded in its notes. It just becomes a bit more woody in the drydown.<br />
<br />
I would like this perfume on my husband, as it gives me a charming masculine vibe, but I don't see myself wearing it, unless it is to read a Sherlock Holmes book in a chesterfield chair by myself. <br />
<br />
This is not a young fragrance, it needs some maturity, it this an office friendly choice, professional if not oversprayed (it can become cloying), but also really nice for any daily activity. <br />
It's a safe blind buy if you happen to like woody fragrances with a sweet undertone.<br />
<br />
I see the comparison with Bewitching Yasmine, since they share similarities in the DNA, but that one is darker, with a touch of oud and incense that make it smoky, dry and, to my nose, much less enjoyable than Babylon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1574246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1574246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1568889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1568889" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="*loves_shoes*"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="*loves_shoes*" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1568889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1568889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258">*loves_shoes*</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-22">05/22/22 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this in store, on a card first. And I loved it. A spicy, vanilla with gorgeous sandalwood. Lovely and woody yet still sweet with a warm spice, very unisex. <br />
Its sweeter than Bewitching Yasmin, but very similar on card. <br />
I then liberally sprayed it in my skin, and directly compared the 2 on skin, where they are a bit more different until the mid and later stages of the drydown where they become almost identical.  <br />
However, on skin it also has a bit of a rubber note, like the rubber in Side Effect (if you smell the rubber there youll know the note I mean). <br />
So despite this being sweeter than Bewitching Yasmine, and having sandalwood which would usually be my preference,  Ive chosen BY over this, because I own Side Effect (where the rubber note is much stronger than in this) and that is enough of that note for me. <br />
However Bweitching Yasmine does have more of an almost soapy note when directly compared to this, so if choosing between the 2 Id try them for yourself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1568889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1568889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561341" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mgriscom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1494986"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mgriscom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1494986">mgriscom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-10">05/10/22 22:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful scent. Warm, spicy, complex. So full of promise when first sprayed on the skin, and then it disappears in about an hour. Very disappointed with the tenacity, the scent itself is lovely though not as unique as Opium. I got a discovery set and was so excited to try them. This was my favorite but still disappointing for the outrageous price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1561341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1561341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1543261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1543261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anorable"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="anorable" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1543261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1543261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473841">anorable</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-14">04/14/22 08:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this scent as a sample! I think it is very strong and not a scent I am used to wearing. I can't tell if I like it or not. It smells good but I don't know if it fits me. I can definitely see this as a winter or fall scent. It is pretty "spicy" with some nice layers of sweetness and woodiness. This scent feels very mature. A young lady might not like this smell and opt for something sweeter. I can see this as a more masculine scent but can be worn by either gender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1543261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1543261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1539612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1539612" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bombalurina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1326071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bombalurina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Eau-de-Parfum-2021-68905.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68905.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Eau de Parfum (2021)"title="Miss Dior Eau de Parfum (2021)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1539612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1539612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326071">Bombalurina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-08">04/08/22 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is beautiful! I definitely get sweet medicinal notes in the opening, its not the average plain sugar sweetness. After a short bit the woody notes start to show, after most of the sweetness leaves it reminds me of By the Fireplace</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1539612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1539612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1530253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1530253" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MissAnnette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/975763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.975763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MissAnnette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Gold-53401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Gold"title="Gentle Fluidity Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1530253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1530253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/975763">MissAnnette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-25">03/25/22 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very similar to Arabian Oud Kalemat. Im sure there are differences when tested side by side but in a blind test I probably cant tell which is which. What I like about this fragrance is the prominent Saffron. Saffron usually smell like Betadine in my nose, but the saffron here is sweeter and creamier with just that faint medicinal smell. Even though I really like this one, I cant justify paying 4x of Kalemat. It doesnt perform better than Kalemat. I must say that its my favorite Penhaligon bottle. The presentation is not similar in the one pictured here. It has a patterned bow that matches the colors of the label. I really want to love this one badly because Babylon is a joke between my dad and I. When I was little he tricked me that Babylon is pronounced with silent L like salmon and I believed him for years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1530253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1530253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1519420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1519420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fpih"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14977"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.14977.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fpih" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Oud-Bouquet-39739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Bouquet"title="Oud Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1519420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1519420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14977">fpih</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-09">03/09/22 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet but not overly so, luscious, yummy, comforting and sexy. Good lasting power, moderate sillage. The most feminine of the Cairo-Halfeti bunch IMHO. I like it a lot, probably more than any of the rest but want to retry to decide if I want to buy it.<br />
<br />
Update: Tried this again and this time it reminds me too much of Oud Bouquet by Lancome which I own (and love), only less opulent/pungeant. Not worth buying for me since they're so similar for my untrained nose at least. Downgrading from Love to Like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1519420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1519420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1517890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1517890" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Voice-Of-God"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Voice-Of-God" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1517890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1517890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207310">Voice-Of-God</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-06">03/06/22 15:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this today in my local Penhaligon's. (I already have Halfeti &amp; Cairo)<br />
As the salesperson sprayed it on a card she said, "It's very manly and exotic." <br />
<br />
After a sniff or two (of what seemed to my nose to be a weak odour similar to Lattafa Raghba), I replied, "I can't really smell anything much. It seems to me to have far less projection than Halfeti &amp; Cairo."<br />
<br />
She remarked, "Yes, Babylon's very soft... it's somewhat weaker than those two."<br />
<br />
I jokingly replied, "It's weaker than my 90 year old Grandmother's bladder. The 'Babylon' they refer to in this is more evocative of the spaceship air freshener in Babylon 5 rather than Babylon in Mesopotamia."  ;)<br />
<br />
She was speechless for a few seconds and then said, "Have you tried Constantinople?"<br />
<br />
I tried Constantinople... it was a little bit stronger smelling than Babylon and seemed nice, but in a 50.00 for 100 ml kinda nice. As I left I remarked, "I think I'll pass today, thanks anyway." ;)<br />
<br />
To avoid constantly sniffing your wrist every 2 minutes to double check if you've applied Babylon or not, and to save any disappointment, I would definitely try before you buy. ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1517890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1517890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1516993" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1516993" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sameenuk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277385"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1277385.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sameenuk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1516993ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1516993" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277385">sameenuk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-05">03/05/22 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is pleasant, as a guy, the initial burst made me think this was for women but it became a very masculine woody scent. There is a lot of pleasing complexity in this scent. Some nutty undertones, probably nutmeg. I'm trying to work out if it's just a woody gourmand scent. I was gifted this bottle but I don't think I'd buy it personally. It's an occasion scent but for the kind of occasions that are few and far between unless it's wedding season in your social network.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1516993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1516993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1516340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Message me on instagram @cmarts___<br />
<br />
I tried this a while ago and have not stopped thinking about it... But its not worth the price as it is not as long-lasting on skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1516340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1516340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hsiangchi.huang"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hsiangchi.huang" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282935">hsiangchi.huang</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-26">02/26/22 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Received a complimentary sample of this perfume, and I was pleasantly surprised. <br />
<br />
If you combine the vanilla from Nuit de Confidence + woody notes from Noir Exquis, you can get 80% close to Babylon. I get predominately nutmeg on the top, which transforms to woodiness (e.g. sandalwood?) later on. Vanilla was present throughout. It's sweet, airy, and cozy (not the cloying dense syrupy artificial vanilla).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1512807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1512807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1500804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1500804" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elsee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/63443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.63443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elsee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bombshell-Midnight-98502.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98502.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombshell Midnight"title="Bombshell Midnight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1500804ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1500804" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/63443">Elsee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-09">02/09/22 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, this perfumer has very little variety now!  I have Love Potion #9 and they don't make it anymore.  Sad!  It's a dupe of Dune so unless you like that one -- skip it.  I would love to smell Babylon but a lot of folks rated this more male...  <br />
<br />
Maybe I'll go for a sample from Lucky Scent and see!  Happy sniffing everyone!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1500804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1500804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1500782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1500782" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cheviota"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cheviota" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Intense-Cafe-18021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cafe"title="Intense Cafe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1500782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1500782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379462">cheviota</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-09">02/09/22 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfect Winter fragrance. I'm not usually a fan of woody scents (By the Fireplace, I'm looking at you), but this is something special. It's woody, spicy, and slightly boozy. Smooth and decadent yet never cloying. The vanilla dry down is so lovely, like you're sipping on a warm cup of chai by an open fire. Longevity and sillage are great too. I'm in love!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1500782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1500782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1494031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350370">AHeroicDuck2K</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-23">01/23/22 01:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have only got a sample of this fragrance. Its a beautiful, creamy vanilla and saffron fragrance at the start, with a gorgeous woody undertone. Everyone that Ive shown this fragrance to also love it. The vanilla is unlike anything Ive smelled before. Average projection and slightly above average longevity. It lasts for about 4 hours on my skin in total, so disappointing considering the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1489063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1489063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1485626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; i didn't have very high hopes for this considering all i got of the intent was nice vanilla scent..<br />
to me this is more than that...<br />
<br />
it has a darkness and a sweetness that is really well-balanced, <br />
i've been looking for a perfume like this for a long time...<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1470746" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1470746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1470746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-26">12/26/21 16:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im getting very different scents every time I smell this. One minute it smells like burning woods. The next a spicy, cinnamon and nutmeg scent. The next, there is almost a boozy vanilla-cherry vibe with oud. This fragrance is a complex and confusing one to my nose. Although it is quite lovely, I will not be adding this to my collection.<br />
<br />
*drydown seems to be an ordinary powerdy vanilla scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1470746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1470746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1459336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Take the vanilla from from the former and the spice from the latter and Babylon is like their beautiful baby. Very comforting, soft and warm for winter. I own the other two so this would be a bit redundant for me but its lovely if you dont have either of these.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1459336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1459336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1456866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This has got to be the sexiest warm unisex fragrance that Ive discovered to date. I can see a man or woman wearing this in the evening time for a date or a meeting. Its dressy.. very dressy. Classy. Imagine being in a high class restaurant by the fire place as they serve hot cocoa with cinnamon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1456866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1456866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1456417" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1456417" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clo2005"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1393738"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="clo2005" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Materi/Cacao-Porcelana-57099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cacao Porcelana"title="Cacao Porcelana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1456417ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1456417" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1393738">clo2005</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-02">12/02/21 23:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening: sweet, medicinal vanilla i get notes of almond (like cooked almond pudding idk but it smells medicinal) and hints of cherry not much wood but i can tell it's there because there's some depth to this fragrance, I hate medicinal scents and cherry in perfumes so will definitely be passing on this regardless of the drydown<br />
<br />
Drydown: beautiful, sweet, creamy vanilla, medicinal scent is gone it is now a gorgeous slightly woody vanilla absolutely love the dry down but i j don't think it worth the medicinal opening</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1456417"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1456417#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1455352" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hunnynpink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304285"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1304285.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hunnynpink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-est-Belle-L-Elixir-95856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"title="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1455352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1455352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304285">Hunnynpink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-01">12/01/21 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is powdery vanilla slightly herbal and earthy, dry down is sweeter slightly spicy, woody vanilla... I would consider this a sweet masculine fragrance. This reminded me of Lalique Le parfum, although more woody less soapy on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1455352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1455352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1454871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1454871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="humicorn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1348927"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="humicorn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lavanila-Laboratories/Pure-Vanilla-4711.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4711.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Vanilla"title="Pure Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1454871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1454871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1348927">humicorn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-30">11/30/21 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Church incense... a cathedral in a cedar forest. Creamy, spicy, smoky vanilla cedar with a bit of black cherry essence peeking through. The spice floating on top almost reminds me of a medicinal, band-aid smell... eh, keeps it interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1454871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1454871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1453446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330942">dismalharmony</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-27">11/27/21 16:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts out smelling like freshly polished wood shot through with vanilla. Dries down kinda spicy, not nearly as much as I thought it would based on the notes. Doesnt last very long but projects nicely for the few hours that it does stick around. I like it a lot for winter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1453446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1453446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1449568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not a clone of either one by itself but like if you layered the two together. <br />
And not the best of both worlds, kinda disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1449568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1449568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1443904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrPopkorne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1287576"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1287576.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrPopkorne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-Concentre-38352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion Concentr"title="Endymion Concentr"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1443904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1443904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1287576">DrPopkorne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-11">11/11/21 05:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh this is a really relaxing perfume. The sweet woody vanilla resting on my arm is reminiscent like others have suggested, of a vanilla spiced latte or chai.<br />
<br />
This became the first fragrance to unlock an old memory for me, of waking up very early on a morning to make cereal while the rest of the family was still fast asleep. We stayed at an old farm cabin during the winter holidays and the wooden beams and staircase filled the air with this cosy aroma and the previous day's fire was merely ash by this point. I'd pour myself some cornflakes and sit in excitement just happy and gullible as kids are, filled with excitement for the Christmas season. I am absolutely thrilled that this memory lives on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="57835"comment_id="1443904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Babylon-57835.html?ccid=1443904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1440624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
